events.name: Southern Mississippi Golden Eagles at Florida State Seminoles

headlines.description: James Blackman threw three of his Independence Bowl-record four touchdown passes to Auden Tate and Florida State beat Southern Mississippi 42-13 on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Florida State beats Southern Miss 42-13 in Independence

video.headline: Blackman connects with Tate on 3rd TD of the game

events.name: Iowa Hawkeyes at Boston College Eagles

headlines.description: Drake Kulick fought for a 1-yard touchdown run late in the fourth quarter on his only carry of the game and Iowa beat Boston College 27-20 in the frigid Pinstripe Bowl on Wednesday night at Yankee Stadium to snap a five-game bowl losing streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Iowa rallies to beat Boston College 27-20 in Pinstripe Bowl

video.headline: Iowa scores late to take New Era Pinstripe Bowl

headlines.description: Elijah Sindelar threw a 38-yard touchdown pass to Anthony Mahoungou with 1:44 remaining and Purdue capped coach Jeff Brohm's first season in dramatic style with a 38-35 victory over Arizona in the Foster Farms Bowl on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Purdue caps Brohm's 1st year with 38-35 bowl win vs. Arizona

headlines.description: Freshman running back Daniel Young had 64 yards receiving with a touchdown and added 48 yards on the ground to help Texas beat Missouri 33-16 in the Texas Bowl on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Young helps Texas beat Missouri 33-16 in Texas Bowl

video.headline: Texas finishes season with a W
